title.rendered: Aqualis ASA: Presentation from Pareto Securities’ 22nd Oil and Offshore Conference

content.rendered:
Aqualis ASA’s presentation at Pareto Securities’ 22nd Oil and Offshore Conference in Oslo on 3 September 2015 is attached. 

This information is subject of the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.

Aqualis ASA – Pareto Conference 2015

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA : Presentation at Pareto Securities Oil & Offshore Conference 2014
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Oslo, 10 September 2014 Aqualis ASA (OSE: AQUA) will today at 17:00 CET present the company at the Pareto Oil & Offshore Conference in Oslo. The presentation is attached to this stock exchange notice, and it will also be published on the company's website (www.aqualisbraemar.com). Pareto Conference 2014 Aqualis ASA…

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar presents at Pareto Securities' 27th Energy Conference 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: CEO David Wells is scheduled to present at Pareto Securities' 27th Annual Energy Conference today, 16 September 2020.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA: Q4 2015 financial results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Oslo, Norway - February 18, 2016:  Q4 2015 Report  |  Q4 2015 Presentation Key highlights Completion of the acquisition of 49.9% ownership in ADLER Solar Revenues of USD 8.8 million in Q4 2015 vs USD 10.6 million in Q4 2014 Operating loss (EBIT) of USD 1.1 million in Q4 2015…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Presentation Material at DNB Annual Small & Medium Enterprises Conference
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: CEO David Wells is scheduled to present at the DNB Annual Small & Medium Enterprises Conference in Oslo today. View the presentation here. For further information, please contact: Investors and financial media Kim Boman, CFO, Aqualis ASA Telephone: +47 959 63 912 Email: kim.boman@aqualis.no Other media enquiries Endre Johansen, Corporate…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA: CFO resigns
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 16 December 2015 - Christian Opsahl has resigned from the position as CFO of Aqualis ASA to pursue interests outside the company. Mr Opsahl's last day of employment will be 31 December 2015, but he will be available to provide support to the company during the interim phase until a…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA: CFO appointment
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 31 December 2015 - Energy consulting group Aqualis ASA has appointed Kim Boman as new CFO. Mr Boman has almost 20 years' experience, primarily from corporate finance and investor relations roles. He was previously head of investor relations for REC Solar ASA. Prior to this he worked in corporate finance…
